messages.message: Hi turkey, how do you feel about your neighbors and playing turkey in general? Once you break through the Balkans and blow past 4 supply centers you can have an explosive game for sure
messages.input: In S1901M, my response to TURKEY:'Hi turkey, how do you feel about your neighbors and playing turkey in general? Once you break through the Balkans and blow past 4 supply centers you can have an explosive game for sure'. No suggestion needed, just for your information.
messages.output: Thank you for sharing that message with Turkey. If you have any further messages or updates from Turkey or any other player that you would like me to evaluate for trustworthiness, please feel free to share them.

messages.message: Well yeah depends on the neighbors

It is advisable to proceed with caution and keep this in mind when interacting or negotiating with Turkey in the future.
